text: Hello. How are you today?
I'm doing well. How are you?
Pretty good..Wish it was still the weekend though. Tough to get back to a routine with the kids and school. Do you have children?
I hear you on that. I have a 2 year old so not quite into the school routine yet, but getting there
One of mine is 2. Such a cute but tough age! Speaking of kids.. Have you ever heard of the charity Save the Children?
Yeah I'm really enjoying it so far, other than the occasional meltdown over nothing... I haven't. What is it?
It is an international charity that focuses on kids in crisis. They mostly help kids in third world countries with things like food, education, and hunger. Really a great charity.
I see. It sounds pretty good. Is that the Sally Struthers one from back in the day?
Haha I remember that commercial! Not that was actually the Christian Children's Fund. But a similar idea I'm sure. Have you ever donated to a children's charity before?
I have, some local ones

That's great. I really like to help kids close to home to. I think it's important to do things in your own neighborhood. But when I can I like to send some abroad too. Would you be willing to make a donation to Save the Children?
Sure, I'd love to
Wow that's great, your money, not matter how small will go to really help kids who need it.  How much do you think would be able to spare?
I think I could spare $2
Wow you are an exceptionally generous person. Is there anything else you'd like to know about Save the Children?
No. I looked it up and it seems pretty legit
Ok great. Well when we are finished talking you will be able to enter the amount in following the survey.
That sounds good
Thanks. Have a great day! I enjoyed speaking with you.
You too! Thanks
